This is fundamental to divergence on momentum indicators: divergences will register with trend legs that either move at a lower rate of change or extend for fewer bars relative to the higher-momentum leg. In actual practice, the presence of ad- ditional noise and ﬂuctuation obscures these simple tendencies, but this is the under- lying truth of momentum divergence.
